title: Diabetes Self Education
summary: This program uses brief, interactive video modules to teach you about diabetes and its management. View the modules at your leisure. At the end of each video you can email a copy to yourself or a loved one.

title: What is Diabetes?
summary:
This brief video covers the basic causes, symptoms and treatments for Diabetes type I and II. Some of the topics that are covered include:
  • What causes Diabetes?
  • How will you be affected?
  • Long term Effects?
  • How will you be treated?

title: Diabetes & Diet
summary:
This brief video covers the basic diet and proper eating habits for people with Diabetes. Some of the topics that are covered include:
  • Does it matter what I eat as a diabetic?
  • Why do I need to eat healthy?
  • What is a healthy diet?
  • Where can I get help with my diet?

title: Understanding Hypoglycemia
summary:
This brief video covers the basic causes, symptoms and treatments for Hypoglycemia. Some of the topics that are covered include:
  • What Causes Hypoglycemia?
  • How Will You Be Affected?
  • How will you be treated?
  • What do you need to do?

title: Hyperglycemia
summary:
This brief video covers the basic causes, symptoms and treatmens for Hyperglycemia. Some of the topics that are covered include:
  • What Causes Hyperglycemia?
  • How Will You Be Affected?
  • How will you be treated?
  • What do you need to do?
